configuration.title: KONTAKT Script Processor (KSP)
configuration.java.location: Location of the java executable. Default is "java"(Search from $PATH variable)
configuration.validate.enable: Enable/disable KSP syntax validation(*ALPHA VERSION). Require: Java 1.6 or higher (Recommend:1.8 or higher) Note: Although the parser will attempt as much error detection as possible, if the grammar of the script content deviates from the KSP specification, it will not function properly.
configuration.realtime.validate.enable: Enable/disable Realtime KSP syntax validation. If true, validator runs on type and save. If false, validator runs on save only.
configuration.realtime.validate.delay: Delay time to start validation. (unit:milliseconds) Recommend: about 500 ms.
configuration.validate.syntax.only: If true, parser does not Semantic analysis. (=Syntax analysis only)
configuration.validate.strict: If true, parser will be 'strict' mode. (Require:ksp.validate.syntax.only=false)
configuration.validate.unused: If true, parser will detect unused variables, user functions. (Require:ksp.validate.syntax.only=false)
configuration.obfuscator.suffix: Default file suffix which generate by Obfuscator from command palette
configuration.obfuscator.inline.function: If true, all user defined functions will be expanded (=inline expansion) when run Obfuscator
configuration.obfuscator.dest.clipboard: If true, obfuscated code will write to clipboard. Otherwise write to given filepath.
configuration.outline.autorefresh: If true, outline will auto refresh. If Very high CPU load, set to false and refresh manually from refresh button
